values:
Pretty much, I haven't updated in over a month.  So here's an update:

--i got my ears double pierced, FINALLY, it may not seem like a big deal, but i've been begging my mom to let me get them done foreverrrr.
--school started, i have every class with jamie
--jamie and i also work together at dollar tree now
--my brother moved out, he's living with some girl in hanover
--my ipod broke and i had to pay 30 dollars to have it sent to apple and get fixed, basically, they sent me my old ipod backand it will probably break again
--my contract at us cellular runs out with october SWEET!  i can't wait to get a new phone, whatever you do never, everrrr get us cellular.  it sucks to the extreme.
--i saw the exorcist of emily rose last night, not as scary as i thought it would be, but the fact that it's a true story makes it crazy.  it was good though, i recommend seeing it.
--this past summer was amazing, i'll never forget it, ever.  it can never be topped.  jamie and i had an amazing last day of summer tooo.  little adventure
--basicalllyy i loove my friends a whole freaking lot.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/57117.html

I bought an elliptical, it was a good deal too.  I love it.  Pretty much going on it everyday, I hope I lose about 600 pounds, that would be amazing.  Today wasn't so great and I haven't been in the best of moods for the past couple days.  I hate getting in moods where one thing can make me cry for hours or just make me feel really depressed.  It's cool, nope.

I just want to spend the rest of my life in my bed either reading, watching John Cusack movies, or watching Law&Order svu.  People could just come over my house and watch movies with me.  Would that be okay?  I'm just joking, a girl can dream though.

I can't wait to go to college, maaaaad boys.  All the good boys in Nashua are either, too old, too young, taken, or gay.  God damnnnn.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/56905.html

I'm going away for the weekend, I'll be home Sunday.  Miss me. <3

By the way, Wedding Crashers is amazing. Charlie and the Chocolate Factory is amazing.

this shall be amazing.  simply because...

...it has this stud in it.  oh my god do i love him.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/56803.html

I'm back from Italy and Greece.  Well, I've been back for almost a week and a half, but get over it.  The trip was probably the most amazing time I've ever had.  I met some really awesome people and some people that I am glad will be attending North next year.  I learned a lot about myself, including some things that I wish I hadn't learned.  I saw so many things and experienced so many things that made me appreciate my life so much more.  I have never missed my parents and my friends so much, I have never missed my bed and my beloved diet coke so much.  I am so glad to be home, I cannot even explain it.  Alright enough mushy shit, here are the

200 euros!

view from the plane.

little cans on the plane.  they call diet coke "coca cola light." as you can seee.

wicked hottie from the plane.  yea, i take pictures of people i don't know when they're sleeping.  get over it.

ITALY!

beach in italy.

beach again.

my first gelado.  so freaking good.

looking down the spanish steps.

the pantheon.  we got off the plane and started touring right away.  i had been up for 36 hours.

vatican city entrance.

the pope lives in the top level of that buidling and he was there because the blinds on the second window from the right were drawn.

the vatican museum.

mosaic floor.  someone placed all those littles tiles there, by hand.

 

st. peter's cathedral.

inside.  i definitely stubbed my toe on a barrier and yelled "fuck" inside.  but i don't think anyone heard me.  although i am most likely going to hell.

sistine chapel.  you're not supposed to take pictures inside, but that's just too bad, cause i took one.

trevi fountain.  probably my favorite part of italy.

wedding cake.  i don't really see it, but whatev.

me inside the coliseum, with my frizzy hair.

this is the average police car.  all the cars in italy are really tiny so they can maximize parking space.  pretty much everyone has a bmw.

this guy is making me................

this! and yes i got a sunburn and you can see it.

 

our overnight ferry to greece.  it was really nice inside.

this was in our room.  hmm a non-smoking ashtray?

love of my life anthony serenading us on the ferry.  he was singing kelly clarkson, just so you know.

 

 

GREECE!

penis on the ground in pompei.  they love they're penises there.

another mosaic.

greek flag at the acropolis.

THE PARTHENON!  my absolute favorite part.

me and amanda at the top of an olympic stadium.

little baby greek olive in my hand.

one of the really nice restaurants we ate at for lunch.

pretty much what i ate everyday.  fried cheese and coca cola light.

the running figure it completely made out of glass.

this guy was made out of legos! at the lego store!

my greek bracelet was rapped up so pretty for me.

where the olympics took place.  athens, greece.

freaking hottie that was observing our tour guide.  he didn't know i was taking a picture of him. :)

our tour guide antonio.  he is simply amazing when he's wasted.  all i have to say it "bustime karaoke."

view from our balcony at Hotel Oscar.  our freaking key card stopped working 3 times.  needless to say the ppl at the front desk were our bffl's.

box of kitties at delphi.

Rachel holding a kitty.

rachel, me, and amanda. athens at night. <3

MY FUTURE HUSBAND.  basically the hottest guy i have ever seen in my whole life.  didn't know i was taking a picture of him.  look at miss fisher haha.

he was so cute, he came over and took a picture with us but he was so embarassed bc his dad kept telling him to put his arms around me and amanda.

CRUISE OF THE GREEK ISLANDS!

our cruise ship, the good old perla.

sunset at mykonos.  pretty much moving there.  soo gorgeous.

beach at the island of rhodes.

walking down the 588 steps that lead up to santorini.

pathway in santorini.

 

THE END!  FINALLY!
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/56564.html
My plane leaves at 4:30.  YEAH MAN!  I am so excited right now. :)
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/56046.html

Next Sunday, I leave for Europe.  4 days until I go, I'm soo excited.  I won't be back until the 15th.  I'll miss everyone and if you're special I'll most likely call you while I'm there.  Call me if you want to hang out before I leave.  Buh-bye Nashua. :)
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/55592.html

picture my mother with her arms flailing in the air saying over and over again "mad booty in the hood yo, MAD BOOTY IN THE HOOD!"  that is what i get for discussing music with my mother.  she's a cutie. <3
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/55008.html

My brother's graduation was fun, really hot, but fun.  Then the 4 1/2 hours I spent at Murphy's for dinner, yea that was fucking awesome.  Hmm, nope.  I got to sit in a nice air condition coffee shop while my parents moved my brother out of his dorm in the heat though. :)

School is pretty much over, Friday was the last day of classes.  I'm only taking 2 finals because the other ones were just projects, I still have to go to school on those days though.  I can't wait to get the hell out of Poulin's class forever.  I'm going to miss my photography class more than anything.  My little Kevy-wevy is growing up so fast and Marissa is moving to Florida after school ends.  This year has been rocky, but I met some awesome people.

Amanda and I leave for Europe in 14 days!  I'm so excited, but I know I'm going to get so home sick.  I'm going to miss everyone, especially Jamie and Cassie.  Ahhh, I love them.  I'm pretty much calling them everyday while I'm gone.

Last night was fun, driving around dancing in the car with Jamie, mall, maplewood, Old Navy<3.  Today consists of Cassie and The Longest Yard.

After my last entry, sooo over it.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/54535.html

It's un-fucking-believable how much I miss you right now.  I can't even explain it.  I haven't laid awake and just thought about you for a long time.  I want to call you right now, like I always did when I couldn't fall asleep.  I want to hear your voice and I want you to tell me how cute I sound when I'm tired, one more time, that's all I want.  You always made me laugh, that's what I loved about you.  You were everything I could have ever wanted.  I wish that I had been enough for you.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/54407.html
I've had my license for 1 year today!  I'm so sick it's not even funny, but I really can't miss school this week. :-/
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/54100.html

I love...
-my TRUE friends.
-candy necklaces.
-candy corn.
-John Cusack movies that cheer me up.
-the Rent Soundtrack.
-800mg Motrin and Percocet.
-my Mom.
-having more than $5 in my bank account (thank you Oklahoma tax returns).

I DO NOT love...
-when people ditch me, but do not have the decency to at least call.
-people who turn around during your classes and blatantly stare directly at you.
-dirty looks.
-people who are rude for no reason.
-incredibly fake people.


My brother graduates from Dartmouth on June 12.  I'm so excited for him and I am looking forward to a weekend away.


I leave for Europe in 34 days. <3 <3 <3

I loved vacation.  Monday=back to reality. :(

It's only 60something days until I leave for Italy!  I'll be gone for 2 weeks over the summer.  I can't freaking wait.

01. Things have been a lot better lately.
02. I love outlets/outlet shopping.
03. I love my friends with everything that I am.
04. I've been driving on empty for about 3 days.
05. I gave away 6 trash bags filled with old clothes.
06. I love cleaning my room and getting rid of old stuff.
07. I love BK boys. ;)
08. I wish I had the ability to say what I am thinking at the exact moment I'm thinking it, instead of regretting what I don't say when I think it.
09. This vacation is starting out to be 5825825902755 times better than the last one.
10. I la la la love my new hoodie.  Dayum it's b-e-a-utiful!
11. I'm obsessed with Tetris, my high score is 44,227!
12. I heart Jamie and the maker of tetris!
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/53045.html

I haven't been myself lately.  I get mad at little things, but I don't say anything and then it builds up.  I snap at people.  I cry all of time, at the drop of a hat, for no reason.  I feel like things are spinning out of control at times and I don't know how to stop them.  I want to keep my friends close to me, not push them away.  I also want to cut somethings/people out of my life that are just completely fake and only pretend to give a shit about me.  I'm not a mean person, although I act it sometimes.  Mostly it's a front, or just a way to take my emotions out in the only way I know how.  I wasn't brought up to deal with anger or frustration.  My Mom holds it inside until she can't take it anymore and my Dad just snaps at people, I have his bad temper.  I need life skills.  I need to get my life back on track.  I need someone to love and someone who will love me.  I need to try harder in school.  I need to try to be happy.  I need to stop crying for no reason.  I'm stronger than this, and I need to start showing it.  This probably doesn't make sense to anyone.


I also have a crush and I hope it goes somewhere because he is definitely worth it.  He makes me smile and doesn't treat me like shit, I'd say that's a good start.


This is random and out of character of me, but someone's birthday was on April 12, I wanted to say Happy Birthday.  After all we've gone through, I wouldn't change anything.  I hope you are happy wherever you are.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/52869.html

You how people always say that bad things happen in threes?  The whole triad thing, oh Mrs. Lessard.  Well, I am nearing the double digits, so whoever said that, is full of crap.  This semester had been one big bad thing.  Don't get me wrong, good things have come along with the bad, meeting new people, becoming closer to old ones, and every once in a whike there is a spectaclar day.  It all started with me dropping my Mom's camera, it completely broke.  We had to get a new one because I have photo.  Then, I was backing out of a parking space after school and some kid came flying behind me, I didn't see him, and I didn't stop.  Nothing happened to my car, but I had a major panic attack and couldn't drive for like a week and a half.  Then, I'm backing out of my driveway, and I get a flat tire.  I go to get it fixed, leave the place, another flat tire!  In less than 24 hours, two flat tires!  It turns out the spring in my car was broken and it punctured both tires.  I come to find out, my car has been on recall since the two weeks after I bought it.  Great Ford Motor Company, let me tell you.  I even bought it from a Ford Dealership, but "they don't do the recalls."  So basically, I could have died if my tire popped on the highway.  I would have lost control of the car, and with the speed on the highway, I could have died.  Major lawsuit, damnit, I would have been set for life.  There was another recall on my car also, for a light or something, no big deal but it was big enough for a recall.  Then, yesterday after school I rearended this girl.  The guy stopped short in front of her and I slammed on my breaks, but it was partially my fault too.  She was so nice about it and nothing was wrong with our cars so we just drove off.  Basically, my car is a tank and nothing will ever hurt it.  I thought I was going to have another panic attack, but I preceded to laugh hysterically for the next 10-15 minutes.  So how many is that?  Camera, accident, flat tire, flat tire, recall, recall, accident.  That is 7, hm, things seem to happen in double for me.  Wow, that was long.

On a lighter note, I decided to make a purse, because I've looked everywhere and the exact one I want is nowhere to be found.  I'm also going to Italy, Athens, and a few other places for 2 weeks over summer vacation.  I'll miss everyone.  I've never been away from home for that long without my parents.  What else has happened?  Amanda turned 18, she got an adorable tatoo and her belly button pierced.  I hung out with her and Jess last night, Rockingham Mall I love you.  I bought a shirt and some sunglasses.  I saw Conrad and Jon last night too, gosh I adore Jon.<3

This vacation is going to suck, another U.S. History project and my Mom wants to visit a bazillion colleges.  So basically I won't even have time to relax.  When the last vacation ended, I needed a vacation from my vacation.  I can't wait until summer, I want to make the best of this one, not hold back, and do somethings out of my comfort zone.

Today:  Errands: bank, cleaning my car, cleaning, maybe quick old navy stop, then a meeting with Rosemary for my project.
Tonight: Something with Jamie and probably sleeping over her house.

Let me know if you would like to hang out over vaca, my Cassie is leaving me. :(
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/52529.html

This weekend was fun.  Friday I went to the mall with Cassie and we saw Amanda and Jess there.  We walked around with them and hung around Target with Trinh.  I got this guy's number who works with her and he seems really nice, we'll see how that goes.  I came home and then Jamie came over, we had a picknick with Diet Barq's Rootbeer and popcorn on my driveway in lawn chairs!  Jealous? Haha you are.  One of the lawn chairs definitely broke and Jamie was basically laying down, haha too funny!  She slept over and left around 2.  I did some cleaning, cause I only had 7 dollars!  Amanda picked me up around 6, we ate at Friendly's in Manchester and I got a wonderful call from Trinh and Cassie!  Then we went to see Guess Who for free!  Gotta love movie passes.  It was kinda stupid, but the ending was cute.  We visited Jeremy and my Jonnyboy at Burger King, fun time. ;) Today will be very boring, but my brother and I will probably end up sitting around and watching Family Guy.  Happy Easter everyone!

 

P.S.  Someone buy me !

Highpoints of this week:
-Handing in my U.S. History project, what a relief.
-Car rides to and from school with Jamie, especially while blasting EJ!
-Dinner last night with Cassie and Trinh, making a commotion in the restaurant.
-CVS and Old Navy with Kayla today.
-The Ring 2 comes out tomorrow!
-I have crazy dreams like every night.
-Law&Order SVU, oh god I love you.
-Jamie, just cause I love her and she supports me in times of need.

Lowpoints of this week:
-Working my ass off Monday and Tuesday night to finish my project.
-Two quizzes today. :(
-Stupid school.
-Stupid bitches.
-Breaking my Mom's camera.
-My roll of film not coming out correctly. :(

So relieved that tomorrow is Friday.  This weekend better be good.  I need a job, BADLY!

I wish I didn't suck so much.  You don't even want to know what I'm thinking right now.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/51632.html

Today is the last real day of vacation. It sucks so bad, because I was grounded for most of it, so I feel completely cheated.

I got my mouth guard, I think it's kinda cute. I have to wear it at night with my bottom retainer, so basically I could kill someone with the appliances in my mouth.

I'm getting new glasses today because my eyesight has gotten way worse and I need a new prescription. I'm going to a doctor that I've never met before, should be exciting.

I found a $20 gift certificate to strawberries in my house so I bought the Frou Frou CD and ring pops for Jamie and I.

I am poor right now, I have $20 on me and $6.24 or something in my bank account. I really need to get a job, but I'll probably have to wait until summer.

I'm starting to spell words wrong, and not long or difficult ones, easy ones that I have known how to spell since forever. Aren't I supposed to get smarter the older I get? That's definitely not happening.

I am freeeeeeeeeeee, yes that's right, I broke free from my groundation tonight.  Jamie and I are watching Law&Order SVU right now, pretty much my favorite show.  Wahoooooo, you're cute.

I saw Finding Neverland today, it was really good.  I had to go all the way to the Bedford mall to see it, but it was worth it.


:)
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/50740.html

My last post was a little bit indecisive.  Some of you may be a bit confused.

Sunday morning, at 5 o'clock, my cell phone rang.  I answered and it was Pat, he wanted to hang out.  Yes, he wanted to hang out at 5 o'clock in the morning.  Well, I gave in.  He came picked me up and we left.  We just drove around for an hour or so.  He told me how he misses me and he was sorry that he fucked up before.  He said he was basically crawling back and that he wanted to be with me again.  It's hard not to believe what someone is telling you, when it's exactly what you want to hear.  We kissed, whatever, I'm a stupid girl.  Anyways, he dropped me off.  I go to the door that I left unlocked, and sure enough it was locked.  I had unlocked the dead bolt, but I hadn't checked if the handle was locked.  Obviously, I freaked out.  I called Amanda because I knew she would be up (she's a manager at BK and she opens at 6:30).  I took the screens off some of the windows on the first floor, sure enough, they were all locked.  Amanda picked me up and brought me to work with her.  I helped her out and managed to come up with a believable story.  I called my mom and told her that Amanda and her boyfriend had gotten into a big fight and she came by to talk before work, but I got locked out.  My mom started screaming at me, calling me an idiot and telling me that I should have just knocked on the door until she woke up.  Yes, I should have, but I didn't because I had no idea what I was going to tell her.  She came and picked me up from BK and told me I was grounded for the rest of vacation.  AWESOME!

Basically, I have thousands of thoughts running through my head.  I have no idea what I want right now and I don't know what to do.  Is it fair to forgive someone who hurt you so badly before?  Who knows.

All I know is, I am going to die.  I miss Jamie, a lot.  She is pretty much my life and I will die without seeing her for a week, trust me I will.  The longest we've gone without hanging out is probably, a day?  At the most!

That's it, this vacation sucks.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/50589.html

Who sneaks out at 5 in the morning with a guy she shouldn't be talking to, let alone hanging out with?  Yea, that would be me.  I'm a stupid girl.


I might be grounded for the rest of the my life, it was nice knowing all of you.  My mom will never let me forget this one.

I'm so happy vacation is here, except I have a huge project to due, Miss. Poulin is wonderful at ruining my life.  4th period is hell for me, I dread it everyday.

Tonight was a blast, as usual.  Jamie and I were blitzed out of our skulls!

I went to the dentist yesterday and apparently I have become a grinder and a clencher.  This explains why I wake up every morning with a headache and I am almost unable to move my jaw.  I'm going to have to wear a mouth guard until I get my wisdom teeth out, it should be quite attractive.

I went home early from school today, I hate school so much now.  The only period I can actually stand is 3rd because I really like photography.

I pretty much want to rip my uterus out.  You all wanted to know.

I am excited because we have a 3 day weekend!  I cannot wait for vacation, it is much needed.

Thank you so much!  My birthday was really good.  I went out to dinner with my parents to Olive Garden.  I got my mini ipod!  I am so in love with it, it is so adorable.  I got some dvd's too.  Overall, it was an awesome birthday.

I can definitely go to see rated R movies by myself now, who wants to come with me?!?



<33

Ever wish you could tell someone something, then go back in time and undo it, depending on his or her reaction? That's exactly how I feel right now. I just can't seem to muster up the courage, or the right words.  I guess it's hard to explain.

I'm watching Saved, I love this movie. It's hilarious, go rent it now if you haven't seen it.

3 more days until my birthday! What up 17? What is everyone getting me?  Just kidding, kinda.

I definitely lost my atm/debit card, which sucks.  I think it's probably been missing since Wednesday, but I noticed last night.  I am trying to avoid telling my mother because she will probably tweak out with "you are so irresponsible, blah blah," something along those lines.  They will probably send me another one and I will end up finding it that day.

Report cards tomorrow, AHH!

Edit: I found my atm card!  I dropped it at the shell station when I was getting gas on Wednesday.  Such a relief.

Once again, we had a delay and I got no more sleep than usual.  It was nice having lots of time to get ready.

New classes kinda suck. Except for 4th period cause the ladies I sit with are awesome.

1st- English with Mrs. Lessard.  She seems nice, but we already have so much work to do, at least I have Cait in that class!
2nd- Calculus with Mrs. Tessier.  I like her a lot, she's nice and she actually cares if we understand what she teaches us.  I'm sad because Sam sits across the freaking room though!
3rd- Photography with Mrs. Mclean, she's really nice and it seems like it's going to be fun.  Lots of cute boys and Kevin makes me laugh.
4th- US History with Miss. Poulin.  She's crazy, but nice.  I got Cassie, Manda, Leah, Trinh and everyone I love, haha.

I wish Erin could have switched into my Photo class but Mr. O'Leary sucks ass.  I miss my freaking Physics table!  Such good times in that class.  I also miss Ducas, I never thought I would say that.  His class wasn't scary though, we did the same thing everyday and I always knew what to expect.

I know everyone heard about that administrator guy getting fired because he lied about like everyone on his resume!  I'll miss commander stache haha.
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/48256.html

Beginning of the week was a joke, since they were the last days before finals.

Thursday: Psychology final was so easy.  Precalc final was so freaking hard.

Friday: Spanish was pretty bad since I didn't study.  Physics was a joke mostly, but hard.  I forgot to bring in my physics book and had to pretend like the one I picked up from across the room was mine.  Needless to say, I now have my very own physics book.  After school went to Wendy's with Jamie, Rob, and Jill.  Went to the mall for a bit and to look for a camera.  Packed and house sat with Jamie, her mom, and sister.  Got like no sleep.

Saturday: Got up early, went to get her sister's oil changed, out to lunch, old navy, home.  Cleaned and did laundry then went out to amherst street for my freaking bird.  Went to Jamie's, went to Hannaford's, holy shit facking hottie there.  We were going to see a movie but Eric came over instead, then I slept over.

Today:  Who knows.

Schedule: English, Calculus, Photography, US History...I'm too lazy to find my schedule and look at the teachers.

<3
http://oh-baby-baby.livejournal.com/48008.html

What can I say about 2004?  It sucked.  I should have know by the start.  The very first day of 2004, my grandmother died.  The rest of the year was as heartbreaking as that day.  Growing apart from friends, other deaths, stupid bitches, various boys, breakups, and general drama.  I hope that 2005 is a different story, because I couldn't take another year like 2004. 

This vacation has been good.  I spent tons of money on clothes that I love.  I hung out with Jamie a lot and we visited Travis a lot at work and hung out with him.  I'd say spending 2 hours in a cold parking garage with 4 boys is a good time.  We pretty much froze/laughed our asses off making poems, singing, and driving around the parking garage.  We started off the new year at H&M, so it was a good time.

I got a haircut, not completely different but I like it. I also went against most of my beliefs and bought a GREEN tank top. It was only to match a cute sweatshirt, but I still own a green tank now.

I hope everyone had a happy and safe New Years Eve.

This weekend was a good one, one of the best in awhile, besides my spanish project stressing me out.

--Friday: Went out to dinner with Jamie, got ripped off by a damn waitress.  Then, back to her house to exchange pressies.  I freaking love my Napoleon shirt, I will be rocking that shit tomorrow and I am wearing my wonderful jammie pants right now!  Damn I love that girl!

--Saturday:  Tweaked out in the morning, because I was stressed about my project, but my brother helped me.  Then went out to dinner with Cait and went to bell ringing for the salvation army at Sam's Club.  We had so much fun dancing and singing and stuff, plus the guy came to pick up the bucket early.  Then Cait and I decided to go to the mall because we didn't want to go home.  We hung around with Manda and Jess, even though they ditched us a couple times to buy me presents. :)  It was a fun night!

--Saturday Night: While we were bell ringing, my brother called my cell phone and asked me when my parents were getting home, cause there was a little accident.  The stove in my kitchen has two burners, like every other stove, but there is also a grill on the other side, which is normally covered  by a metal grill cover.  Apparently, the grill got turned on, the grill heated up, and the grill cover heated up.  On top of the girll cover was a little can of tomato sauce, and my george foreman grill.  The can of tomato sauce got so hot, that it exploded.  It sprayed burned tomato sauce all over the ceiling above, some on the rug, and all over the cabinets.  For those of you who have a foreman grill, the drip tray was completely melted on top of the grill cover and the bottom of the grill was completely melted.  Needless to say, my foreman grill is no longer.  The weird thing is, the nobs for the grill are not easily turned on and when the grill does turn on, the stove fan turns on.  So it was almost impossible for it to be turned on and left on.  Who knows what happened!

--Today:  I have to memorize my spanish paper to present tomorrow, I got some other homework, and I will probably go to bed rediculously early tonight and I love it!


That's all folks.
